Title: Allenview South Car Park Footbridge Repairs
Description:
The scheme is in the town of Wimborne, Dorset. The scheme consists of repairs to and repainting of an existing footbridge. The bridge has a span of approximately 12m and is some 2m wide. It carries a footpath between Allenview South Car Park and the Allendale Centre over the River Allen. The bridge consists of mild steel beams spanning the river with timber decking and handrails.
The scheme involves minor site clearance works, lifting the footbridge off its existing abutments and storing in the car park to allow repairs / repainting to be carried out within a temporary facility. On completion, the footbridge will be replaced.

Title: Construction of Footbridge at Colliers Meadow Culmstock
Description:
Culmstock Parish Council own a small riverside meadow, donated by the Collier family, on the east bank of the Culm river, opposite The Strand, Culmstock, and wish to make it accessible to locals and visitors. The proposed site, opposite an existing war memorial to the south of The Strand was located as the preferred location for the new bridge (see drawing B6 CPC.184.01_Rev.11_Footbridge Plan).
This contract is for the engineering design, supply and construction of the bridge and is subject to successful grant application for the funding of the project.

Title: High Street (Mill Stream) Footbridge Replacement
Description: The scheme is located in the town of Wimborne, Dorset. The scheme consists of replacing an existing timber footbridge and ramp. The bridge has a span of approximately 7m and is some 2m wide. It carries a footpath between Crown Mead Car Park and High Street Car Park.

Title: NCC351 Kirkhaugh Footbridge Reconstruction
Description: The works comprise of design, fabrication and installation of superstructures of Kirkhaugh Footbridge, in Kirkhaugh, Northumberland, to reinstate pedestrian access following damage caused by the 2018 floods which led to the removal of two spans. Further information on this opportunity can be found on https://procontract.due-north.com, all questions and Tender submissions must be sent via this Portal.

Title: Design, Fabrication, Testing, Supply & Installation of a Single Span Low Arched Footbridge & Associated Works
Description:
Swale Borough Council is inviting Expressions of Interest to tender for  design, fabrication, supply and installation of a fully compliant single span low arched footbridge and associated works. 
The contract will commence on Monday, 6 July 2020 and terminate on Saturday, 5 September 2020.  The tenderer/s who submit the Most Economically Advantageous Tender, (MEAT) will be awarded the contract.
The contract will involve Design, fabrication, testing, supply and installation of a fully compliant single span low arched footbridge and associated works in a robust, durable and long lasting material.
Expressions of Interest and Invitation to Tender (I.T.T.) must be submitted / uploaded on the Council's e-tendering portal.
The closing date for submission of Expressions of Interest and the closing date for the I.T.T. will be 20/04/2020 at 09:00.

Title: Historical Railways Estate (HRE) - Works Framework 2020
Description:
The award of the Historical Railways Estate (HRE) - Works Framework 2020. The key purpose of this tender exercise is to deliver the Works element of the Historical Railways Estate (HRE) Provision. The works framework will provide the minor works intervention and, from time to time, reactive maintenance for 3190 assets throughout mainland Great Britain. 

Lot 1 - National - Major Works 
Typically, these orders equate to £200k or above. All works on this lot are awarded following secondary competition. This lot will hold three suppliers.

Lot 2 - North - Minor Works & Emergency response 
Typically, these orders equate to less than £200k. All works will be awarded via Direct Allocation. This lot will hold three suppliers.

Lot 3 - South - Minor Works & Emergency response 
Typically, these orders equate to less than £200k. All works will be awarded via Direct Allocation on this. This lot will hold three suppliers.
